alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lake and southwestern Orange Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Lake Louisa, or 12 miles south of Groveland, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Winter Garden, Bay Lake, Clermont, Oakland and Lake Louisa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional to frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
